events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund because this product is not what I ordered.
System identified the issue as a refund request based on customer keywords such as refund and wrong item.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah M. to handle the refund request promptly.
Hello! I'm Sarah, and I will assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
Please confirm the name and order number so I can verify your purchase and start the refund procedure.
The order number is 78945231, under the name John Stevens. Please let me know what the next steps are.
Thank you for the info. We will issue a full refund after you return the item using the prepaid shipping label we will send you.
That sounds great, thank you. I will ship the product back as soon as I get the label.
We have received your returned item and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund was received properly and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Yes, the refund was successfully credited to my account. Thanks for your help and quick response.
Closing the case as the refund process has been completed and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
We sent a satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on how well we handled your refund request.
The customer completed the survey with positive feedback, praising the service and timely refund process.
The case has been archived automatically after successful resolution and feedback collection.
